com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders

Class SpaceInvadersGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
      • org.mini2Dx.core.game.BasicGame
        • com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.SpaceInvadersGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameResizeListener

    public class SpaceInvadersGame
extends org.mini2Dx.core.game.BasicGame
    This class represents the main game and contains all the game logic. Rendering and updating onscreen objects and stuff like that will all be done here.
    Author:
    Yannic Wehner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkForEnemyHits()
      This method checks for collisions between the player projectiles and enemies and will damage or remove the enemy and the projectile accordingly.
      private void checkForPlayerHits()
      This method checks for collisions between player ship, enemy projectiles and enemies itself, and if a collision is detected will damage or remove the objects accordingly.
      private void clearOffScreenAliens()
      This method removes the aliens which have left the visible play area.
      private void clearOffScreenProjectiles()
      This method clears all the projectiles that have left the visible play area.
      void dispose()
      This method is called when the game is closed.
      private void enemyAttacks()
      This method is used to generate the enemy attack pattern and to dispatch the projectiles accordingly.
      private java.util.ArrayList<BasicEnemy> generateAlienRow(int rowIndex, int aliensPerRow, float alienSpacing)
      This method generates a new alien row for the alien cluster.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<BasicEnemy>> generateAliens()
      This method generates a new alien cluster.
      void initialise()
      This is run when the game starts and is only called once.
      void interpolate(float alpha)
      This is where your game calculates the render coordinates of your sprites.
      private void reactToKeyPresses()
      This method will react to all the key presses and update the game state accordingly.

      This is where you'll draw you game to the screen.

      This method scales the wallpaper to make it fit into the current window.

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public void initialise()
        This is run when the game starts and is only called once. Here you'll create any required objects and load any resources needed for your game. After the initialise method is finished, the update, interpolate and render methods are called continuously until the game ends.
        Specified by:
        initialise in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        This is where your game will apply game logic, update animations, change background music, etc.
        Specified by:
        update in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
        Parameters:
        delta - The variable called 'delta' is provided and represents the amount of time in seconds to advance game logic. By default delta is 0.1 seconds.

      • interpolate

        public void interpolate(float alpha)
        This is where your game calculates the render coordinates of your sprites.
        Specified by:
        interpolate in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
        Parameters:
        alpha - The variable 'alpha' will be between 0.0 and 1.0, representing how much of an update to simulate, i.e. 0.5 means it is halfway through an update.

      • render

        public void render(org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Graphics g)
        This is where you'll draw you game to the screen.
        Specified by:
        render in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
        Parameters:
        g - Provided by mini2Dx. Common interface to graphics rendering functionality.

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)
        This method gets called every time the game window is resized.
        Overrides:
        resize in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
        Parameters:
        width - The new window width. This value is provided automatically
        height - The new window height. This value is provided automatically.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        This method is called when the game is closed.
        Overrides:
        dispose in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer

      • reactToKeyPresses

        private void reactToKeyPresses()
        This method will react to all the key presses and update the game state accordingly.

      • generateAliens

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<BasicEnemy>> generateAliens()
        This method generates a new alien cluster.
        Returns:
        Returns a list containing all the alien rows, each in a separate list.

      • generateAlienRow

        private java.util.ArrayList<BasicEnemy> generateAlienRow(int rowIndex,
                                                         int aliensPerRow,
                                                         float alienSpacing)
        This method generates a new alien row for the alien cluster.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The index of the row to generate.
        aliensPerRow - The number of aliens per row.
        alienSpacing - The spacing between aliens in pixels.
        Returns:
        Returns a new List containing a single row of aliens.

      • clearOffScreenProjectiles

        private void clearOffScreenProjectiles()
        This method clears all the projectiles that have left the visible play area.

      • clearOffScreenAliens

        private void clearOffScreenAliens()
        This method removes the aliens which have left the visible play area.

        This method checks for collisions between the player projectiles and enemies and will damage or remove the enemy and the projectile accordingly.

      • checkForPlayerHits

        private void checkForPlayerHits()
        This method checks for collisions between player ship, enemy projectiles and enemies itself, and if a collision is detected will damage or remove the objects accordingly.

      • enemyAttacks

        private void enemyAttacks()
        This method is used to generate the enemy attack pattern and to dispatch the projectiles accordingly.

        This method scales the wallpaper to make it fit into the current window.

        Returns:
